name: Riya Choudhary
follow_up_instructions: Attend dialysis sessions as scheduled (3 times per week)
Monitor blood pressure daily and log readings
Schedule lab work for kidney function tests in 2 weeks
Limit sodium intake to 2000mg per day
Weigh yourself daily and report sudden weight gain (>2 lbs in 24 hours)
discharge_summary:
Patient Riya Choudhary was admitted on 2025-09-20 with Urinary Tract Infection with Complications. 
During hospitalization, patient was managed with Epoetin alfa injection weekly, Metformin 500mg twice daily, Sodium bicarbonate 650mg three times daily. 
Procedures performed included Peritoneal dialysis catheter insertion, Central line placement, Hemodialysis catheter placement.
Patient's condition improved and was stable at discharge. 
Discharged home with instructions to follow up with nephrologist and continue medications as prescribed. 
Patient educated on warning signs and dietary restrictions.
